entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 02:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: S 30 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
